text: Æt Heortforda Æþelnode and Ælfsige þas genbec hyrað into Wincescumbe.
Ðis synd þa landgemæro þære <anre> hidæ into heortforda of stanforda.
Of mæres slæde up on þa cæstello easteweardre.
Of þan cæstello on colomores sic neoþeweardre.
Up on burg hæma weg ondlang þæs weges on þone litlan beorh.
Þonne swa andlang furu þæt on þa healdan stige.
Þonne andlang hricweges on þa ea æt þære ealdan mylne andlang ea eft on stanford.
Þonne is þæs landes an hid þe Oswold bisceop bocað Æðelnoðe his þegne þreora manna dæg on þa gerad wyrce<../images/tbar.gif>he wyrce<../images/tbar.gif>þæt land sio unforworht.
